SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_dict (KEYY, VALUEE, FIELD_NAME, TABLE_NAME) values (#{keyy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{valuee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
